summary: AN ORDINANCE renewing, for a period of ten (10) years, the permission granted to Seattle University by Ordinance 96719, to construct, maintain and operate certain steam mains or appurtenances in, under and across East Columbia Street from 12th Avenue to 14th Avenue, and 14th Avenue from East Columbia Street to East Jefferson Street; amending Section 12 thereof to update insurance requirements; and establishing the annual fee for the next five (5) years of the permit.
